# Exercise 1

## Replace skip = "__" with the number of rows to skip and na = "____" with the value to replace. Then run the code.

```{r Import data, eval=FALSE}

  
svy <- read_excel("data/sample_tch_svy_raw.xlsx",
                  skip = ___,
                  na = "___")

```

# Exercise 2

## Use the `dfSummary()` function to review our data

```{r}

dfSummary(svy)

```
